Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $10,000 to me. Considering its immense worth to both us and potential buyers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also maximizing my return on investment. I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
